description: Proposed telecom installation of 20m Phase 8 Monopole complete with wrapround cabinet at base and associated ancillary works
decision_conditions: The proposed telecoms equipment by virtue of its siting and appearance would result in an incongruous addition to the streetscene that would be visually intrusive and create visual clutter and would not be in keeping with and detract from the character and appearance of the surrounding area. The proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

The information submitted pursuant to Condition 7 (Arboricultural Method Statement) of planning permission 22/00420/FUL (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of two storey replacement dwelling with rooms in loft space and new vehicle crossover) has been assessed by Officers and is considered acceptable.
We note that Exsiting and Proposed East Elevations have not been submitted. Please can you explain why, or submit these plans?
